alert.note: Alert for Dodge (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 24 at 1:24AM CDT until October 24 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DODGE COUNTY... At 122 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hayfield, or 12 miles southwest of Rochester, moving northeast at 45 mph. This storm has produced hail of pea sized so far. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to thin objects. Locations impacted include... Kasson, Hayfield, Oslo, County Roads 6 And 15, County Roads 6 And 9, and Highway 56 And County 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
